jparsec.astrophysics.gildas

Class ByteArrayConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • jparsec.astrophysics.gildas.ByteArrayConverter

  • public class ByteArrayConverter
extends java.lang.Object
    The ByteArrayConverter class provides methods for writing, and reading different primitive types to, and from an array of bytes. All methods in this class accept a byte array and an offset to perform the operation. This class is useful for marshalling up arguments for send() calls in an efficient fashion (i.e. as an alternative to sending Strings).

    K.Galloway comment: Big Endian implementation

    Author:
    Mark MacBeth

        offset - The offset of the first bit of the value in the array.
